name: Pmvcf
tagline: A simple Perl module for parsing and manipulating VCF files
body:
PmVCF ====== PmVCF is a simple Perl module for parsing and manipulating VCF files __Author & contributors:__ Shujia Huang
__Contact :__ huangshujia@genomics.cn
Copyright © 2014-2015 LICENSE -------- ### addformat Usage : perl vcfutil.pl addformat -from [vcf] -to [Target vcf] -add 'foo:bar' > OutputVCF CAUTION The samples and the order of sample should be the same in [-from [vcf]] and [-to [Target vcf] ]
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
